name: quiet-panda-44
author: SelfMadeSystem
description: quiet-panda-44 组件 (animation, button, upload, line, lineart, line-art, interactive)

uniapp.template:
<button class="button"></button>
  <view xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"></view>
    <rect class="border" pathLength="100"></rect>
    <rect class="loading" pathLength="100"></rect>

    <view class="done-svg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"></view>
      <path class="done done-cloud" pathLength="100" d="M 6.5,20 Q 4.22,20 2.61,18.43 1,16.85 1,14.58 1,12.63 2.17,11.1 3.35,9.57 5.25,9.15 5.88,6.85 7.75,5.43 9.63,4 12,4 14.93,4 16.96,6.04 19,8.07 19,11 q 1.73,0.2 2.86,1.5 1.14,1.28 1.14,3 0,1.88 -1.31,3.19 Q 20.38,20 18.5,20 Z"></path>
      <path class="done done-check" pathLength="100" d="M 7.515,12.74 10.34143,15.563569 15.275,10.625"></path>
    </svg>
  </svg>
  <view class="txt-upload">Upload</view>
</button>
